definition: performance of music or dance especially by soloists
details:
noun
- performance of music or dance especially by soloists
- the act of giving an account describing incidents or a course of events
= synonyms: yarn
- a detailed account or description of something
= example: a detailed account or description of something
- a detailed statement giving facts and figures
= example: a detailed statement giving facts and figures
- a public instance of reciting or repeating (from memory) something prepared in advance
= synonyms: recitation
